en: Daddy Pig wears glasses.
zh: 猪爸爸常戴着眼镜。

en: He needs to wear glasses to see clearly.
zh: 他需要戴着眼镜才能看得清楚。

en: When Daddy Pig wears his glasses,everything looks fine.
zh: 当猪爸爸戴着眼镜时，一切都看得很清楚。

en: But when Daddy Pig takes his glasses off......he can't see things clearly.
zh: 但是当猪爸爸摘下眼镜时。。。。。。他就看不清了。

en: Everything looks a bit soft and fuzzy.
zh: 所有的东西看上去都很模糊。

en: So, it is very important that Daddy Pig knows where his glasses are.
zh: 所以，对于猪爸爸来说，知道他的眼镜在哪是很重要的。

en: Sometimes, Daddy Pig loses his glasses.
zh: 有时，猪爸爸会找不到他的眼镜。

en: Peppa, George. Have you seen Daddy Pig's glasses?
zh: 佩奇，乔治。你们看到爸爸的眼镜了吗？

en: He can't find them anywhere.
zh: 他到处找也找不到。

en: No, Mummy.
zh: 没有，妈妈。

en: Peppa and George do not know where Daddy Pig's glasses are.
zh: 佩奇和乔治不知道猪爸爸的眼镜在哪。

en: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig cannot see a thing without them.
zh: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸没有眼镜什么都看不到

en: and it makes him very grumpy.
zh: 这让他很焦躁的。

en: Without his glasses on, Daddy Pig cannot read his newspaper.
zh: 没有眼镜，猪爸爸不能看报纸。

en: This is ridiculous!I can't see anything!
zh: 真可笑！我什么也看不到！

en: Somebody must have put my glasses somewhere.
zh: 一定是有人将我的眼镜藏起来了。

en: Do you remember where you last put them,Daddy Pig?
zh: 你还记得你最后把他们放哪了吗，猪爸爸？

en: When I don't wear them,I always put them in my pocket.
zh: 当我不戴时，我总是把眼镜放在我的口袋里。

en: But they aren't there now.
zh: 但是它现在不在口袋里。

en: Daddy! Can we help find your glasses?
zh: 爸爸！我们能帮你一起找眼镜吗？

en: Good idea, Peppa.
zh: 好主意，佩奇。

en: If you find them,
zh: 如果你找到了，

en: Daddy will stop being so grumpy.
zh: 爸爸就不再焦躁了。

en: I'm not grumpy.
zh: 我没有焦躁。

en: Peppa and George are looking for Daddy's glasses.
zh: 佩奇和乔治开始找爸爸的眼镜了。

en: Peppa looks under the newspaper.
zh: 佩奇找了报纸下面。

en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那里。

en: George looks on top of the television.
zh: 乔治找了电视机的上面。

en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜也不在那里。。

en: Let's look upstairs in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom!
zh: 让我们上楼去妈妈和爸爸的卧室找找！

en: Peppa and George are looking in Mummy and Daddy Pig's bedroom.
zh: 佩奇和乔治开始在猪妈妈和猪爸爸的卧室里找。

en: George... be careful not to knock anything over.
zh: 乔治。。。小心点，不要碰倒东西了。

en: It's not funny.
zh: 这一点也不好笑。

en: Peppa looks under the pillows.
zh: 佩奇找了枕头底下。

en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那。

en: George looks in Daddy's slippers.
zh: 乔治找了爸爸的拖鞋。

en: But the glasses are not there, either.
zh: 但是眼镜也不在那。

en: Let's look in the bathroom!
zh: 让我们去浴室找找！

en: Peppa and George are looking in the bathroom.
zh: 佩奇和乔治开始在浴室找。

en: The glasses are not in the bath.
zh: 眼镜不在浴缸里

en: The glasses are not in the toilet.
zh: 眼镜也不在厕所里。

en: Hmm ! It's too difficult.
zh: 唔！太难找了。

en: Peppa and George cannot find Daddy Pig's glasses anywhere.
zh: 佩奇和乔治到处找都没找到猪爸爸的眼镜。

en: We've looked everywhere.
zh: 我们已经到处找了。

en: But we can't find Daddy's glasses.
zh: 但是我们没有找到爸爸的眼镜。

en: Oh, dear. Now, what can we do?
zh: 哦，糟了。现在，我们该怎么办？

en: I suppose I'll just have to learn to do without them...
zh: 我想我只有适应没有眼镜的生活。。。

en: If I move slowly, I won't bump into things.
zh: 如果走得慢，我不会撞到东西的。

en: There they are! Daddy's glasses!
zh: 在这里！爸爸的眼镜！

en: Daddy Pig. You were sitting on them all the time!
zh: 猪爸爸。原来你一直坐在眼镜上面！

en: Oh...
Silly Daddy!
zh: 糊涂的爸爸！

en: I don't know how they got there.
zh: 我不知道它怎么会跑到那里去的。

en: I wonder how!
zh: 我很好奇是怎么回事！

en: Well, you may have been a bit silly,
zh: 好吧，你的确有点糊涂，

en: Daddy Pig, but at least you're not grumpy anymore!
zh: 猪爸爸，但至少你不会焦躁了！

en: I was not grumpy.
zh: 我没有焦躁。
